attributes.action: Allow Royal Mail to negotiate a fairer pricing Structure for its down stream access service with Postcomm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Government to allow Royal Mail to re-negotiate a more reasonable pricing structure for the DOWN STREAM ACCESS service with postcomm. Currently Royal Mail is told what it can charge for outside companies using its services. We believe this is most unfair and does not allow for realistic competition.
